UGA Mathcamp

Higher math for high school students.



Welcome to the UGA MathCamp page!

At MathCamp, UGA faculty mentors each work with a graduate student helper, and and undergraduate helper guiding a group of roughly 5 high school students on exploratory projects in a range of topics. Topics vary year to year, but in the past, they have included topology, graph theory, number theory, and mathematical biology.

Our next weeklong camp will run during the summer of 2016. If you are interested in information about our next camp, please fill out the mailing list form below!

sign up for our mailing list, summer 2016
